section.title: Overview
section.para: This module provides an HTTP transport layer implementation for &osips;'s Management Interface.

section.title: To-do
section.para: Features to be added in the future:

section.title: &osips; Modules
section.para:
The following modules must be loaded before this module:
httpd module.

section.title: mi_http_root(string)
section.para: Specifies the root path for mi http requests. The link to the mi web interface must be constructed using the following patern: http://[opensips_IP]:[opensips_mi_port]/[mi_http_root]

section.title: mi_http_method(integer)
section.para:
Specifies the HTTP request method to be used:
0 - use GET HTTP request
1 - use POST HTTP request

section.title: Exported Functions
section.para: No function exported to be used from configuration file.

section.title: Known issues
section.para: Commands with large responses (like ul_dump) will fail if the configured size of the httpd buffer is to small (or if there isn't enough pkg memory configured).
Future realeases of the httpd and mi_httpd modules will address this issue.
